name: Missile Command: Sarah Morris Edition
description:
The Atari 2600 version of Missile Command, but with a twist. Missile Command: Sarah Morris Edition is based on the work of the artist, Sarah Morris. This project was for a university assessment and my portfolio.

The original Missile Command has a level of tactical intelligence or gameplay required to do well in it, the Sarah Morris Edition takes that and multiplies it to the point where if you want to do well, you'll have to think about what you want to do with everything you have to protect your cities.

Game Designer: Sholto Tiger Collins

Game Programmer: Sholto Tiger Collins

Whether you are on Windows or OsX you will want to use a mouse and not a trackpad if possible.
